fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Environment, Trans-European Networks, Food Safety, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Regulation about the use of Neonicotinoïden and other herbicides or pesticides. All initiatives on New Breeding Technologies
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
SESVanderHave is a unique sugar beet seed company. Through responsive research, teamwork and partnerships, we offer reliable seed solutions for the sugar beet industry and growers, in every potential sugar beet area of the world. 
 Committed to making sugar beet growing and sugar production a healthy business.
